sources.title: Son of the Dragon | FULL MOVIE | Part 1 of 2 | Action, Fantasy | David Carradine
sources.description:
In Part 1: After masquerading as a prince to win the fabulous riches of a princess, a resourceful young thief finds himself unexpectedly falling in love with the Princess and battling two Princes for her hand in marriage.

Watch Part 2 here: https://youtu.be/NUKd1Uo7MLs

David Carradine
Rupert Graves
John Reardon
Burt Kwouk
Theresa Lee
Desiree Siahaan
Eddy Ko
Kay Tong Lim
Nitin Ganatra

2006
Directed by David Wu

sources.title: Son of the Dragon | FULL MOVIE | Part 2 of 2 | 2006 | Fantasy | David Carradine
sources.description:

Watch Part 1 here if you missed it! https://youtu.be/60-fTh93PBY
